p: Hierarchical cluster analysis of EUCLEG and NJAU combined was performed to determine the relationship among accessions of both collections, and to see the relationship between the EUCLEG part from the Chinese origin with other accessions. For this, a dendrogram was constructed following Ward’s D2 method ( Murtagh and Legendre, 2014) and using Nei’s standard genetic distances between accessions ( Nei, 1972).
